results.title: [Treatment of chronic heart failure in patients with mitral and aortic valve defects of rheumatic origin].
results.text_hl: RESULTS: Hemodynamic parameters and ET improved after @CHEMICAL_Captopril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002216 @@@capoten@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ treatment in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with MVD or AVD and in complex disease (@<m>DISEASE_Constriction_Pathologic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003251 @@@stenosis@@@ and insufficiency) with predominant insufficiency.

citations.NLM: Bagirova GG, Batalina MV. [Treatment of chronic heart failure in patients with mitral and aortic valve defects of rheumatic origin]. Ter Arkh. 2000;72(9):63-6. PMID: 11076422
citations.BibTeX: @article{11076422, title={[Treatment of chronic heart failure in patients with mitral and aortic valve defects of rheumatic origin].}, author={Bagirova GG and Batalina MV}, journal={Ter Arkh}, volume={72}, number={9}, pages={63-6}}

results.title: Conversion of post-systolic wall thickening into ejectional thickening by selective heart rate reduction during myocardial stunning.
results.text_hl: After exercise completion, @<m>DISEASE_Constriction_Pathologic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003251 @@@stenosis@@@ was relieved and saline, @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ or @CHEMICAL_Ivabradine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077550 @@@ivabradine@@@ (both at 1 mg/kg iv) were administered.

citations.NLM: Lucats L, Ghaleh B, Monnet X, Colin P, Bizé A, Berdeaux A. Conversion of post-systolic wall thickening into ejectional thickening by selective heart rate reduction during myocardial stunning. Eur Heart J. 2007 Apr;28(7):872-9. PMID: 17376788
citations.BibTeX: @article{17376788, title={Conversion of post-systolic wall thickening into ejectional thickening by selective heart rate reduction during myocardial stunning.}, author={Lucats L and Ghaleh B and Monnet X and Colin P and Bizé A and Berdeaux A}, journal={Eur Heart J}, volume={28}, number={7}, pages={872-9}}

results.title: Peripheral pulmonary artery stenosis in three cats
results.text_hl: In Cases 1 and 2, the pressure gradient through the @<m>DISEASE_Constriction_Pathologic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003251 @@@stenosis@@@ decreased after treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@.

citations.NLM: Aoki T, Sunahara H, Sugimoto K, Ito T, Kanai E, Fujii Y. Peripheral pulmonary artery stenosis in three cats J Vet Med Sci. 2015 Apr;77(4):487-91. PMID: 25650057
citations.BibTeX: @article{25650057, title={Peripheral pulmonary artery stenosis in three cats}, author={Aoki T and Sunahara H and Sugimoto K and Ito T and Kanai E and Fujii Y}, journal={J Vet Med Sci}, volume={77}, number={4}, pages={487-91}}

results.title: Treatment of hypertension in peripheral arterial disease.
results.text_hl: A trial comparing the @CHEMICAL_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002118 @@@calcium@@@ antagonist @CHEMICAL_Verapamil @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014700 @@@verapamil@@@ versus placebo in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ undergoing angioplasty (n = 96) suggested that @CHEMICAL_Verapamil @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014700 @@@verapamil@@@ reduced @DISEASE_Coronary_Restenosis @DISEASE_MESH:D023903 @@@restenosis@@@ (per cent diameter @<m>DISEASE_Constriction_Pathologic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003251 @@@stenosis@@@ (+- SD) 48.0% +- 11.5 versus 69.6% +- 12.2; P < 0.01), although this was not reflected in the maintenance of a high ABI (0.76 +- 0.10 versus 0.72 +- 0.08 for @CHEMICAL_Verapamil @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014700 @@@verapamil@@@ versus placebo).

citations.NLM: Lane DA, Lip GY. Treatment of hypertension in peripheral arterial disease. Cochrane Database Syst Rev. 2013 Dec 4;(12):CD003075. PMID: 24307487
citations.BibTeX: @article{24307487, title={Treatment of hypertension in peripheral arterial disease.}, author={Lane DA and Lip GY}, journal={Cochrane Database Syst Rev}, number={12}, pages={CD003075}}
